name: Yuzu
description: Tiny Japanese restaurant hidden in a back alley behind Spitafields Market. The atmosphere is cozy, intimate, minimalist and modern. The owner Nasser is an Algerian who fell in love with Japan, he speaks really good Japanese and French by the way. He makes the best sushi in London by far. Hot dishes are also great, especially the eel and the friend chicken. Conveyor belt only for lunch.
